product_description: Staple pants are cut from polished cotton-blend twill with plenty of stretch to keep you comfortable from the morning conference to the happy hour meet-up.
product_details_and_care:
Staple pants are cut from polished cotton-blend twill with plenty of stretch to keep you comfortable from the morning conference to the happy hour meet-up.
28" inseam; 17" leg opening; 12" front rise; 21" back rise (size 18W)
Zip fly with hook-and-bar closure
Front slant pockets; faux back welt pockets
53% cotton, 40% viscose, 7% spandex
Machine wash, tumble dry
Imported
Point of View
Item #5787449
